en.training_desc: Join certified programs designed for therapists and wellness experts.
en.clinics_desc: Partner with clinics bringing Kapunka treatments to their clients.

learn.manifesto: Discover the origins of Kapunka and the values that guide our craft.
learn.founderStory: Learn how Monica bridged Moroccan cooperatives with today’s clinical rituals.
learn.videos: Watch tutorials and stories to see our rituals in motion.
learn.productEducation: Learn how to choose and use argan-based products for every routine.
learn.method: Explore the Kapunka method with step-by-step techniques.
